sentences.english: State-of-the-art systems report producing biogas that is more than 95% pure methane.

sentences.english: This paper reports for the experimental study of continuous methane fermentation by using Eupatorium adenophorum Spreng.

sentences.english: These micro biogas plants are an innovative and sustainable way to bring development.

sentences.english: The large-scale pig farm with power generation netting will be the tide.

sentences.english: The ammonia comes from firedamp fermentation has been determined by ammonium - gas - sensitive electrodes with satisfactory results.

sentences.english: Test can be shown, floating algae can be used to made biogas in Tongyu River.

sentences.english: Toxicant eupatorium adenophorum spreng can be used as a feedstuff after methane fermented.

sentences.english: The problem of methane or coal dust in a mine's air is relatively easy to solve.

sentences.english: The biogas system is the kernel component of Guquan Experimental Farm of Ecological Engineering.

sentences.english: The ecological and economic benefits from using the solar stove and the methane are remarkable in the west Qinling mountain area.

sentences.english: In the United States, biogas systems are rare.
